sentences.en: The center of these glands manufactures adrenaline.
sentences.cn: 这些腺的中心分泌肾上腺素。

sentences.en: The dryness in my mouth vanished and I could feel the adrenaline flooding my body.

sentences.en: The applause acted on her like a shot of adrenaline.
sentences.cn: 掌声犹如给她注射了一支强心剂。

sentences.en: The adrenaline was coursing through his system.
He felt a surge of pure adrenaline as he won the race.
sentences.cn: 他赢得比赛时感到一阵激动。
